item.title: Binance Alpha Futures Section Witnesses Significant Token Price Surges, with MYX and TALE Leading the Way
item.description: On September 8th, based on market data, certain tokens in the Binance Alpha sector experienced significant gains today. MYX and TALE took the lead. The details are as follows:MYX witnessed a 173.39% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.7;TA saw a 74% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.17706;TALE saw a 68% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.005185;TOWN saw a 56% increase in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.006358.BlockBeats reminds users that the prices of these related tokens are highly volatile, and users should invest with caution.

item.title: Frax Founder Discusses Hyperliquid USDH Competition: Interoperability Value Over Yield
item.description: On September 8th, Sam Kazemian, the founder of Frax, stated in a social media post that the key insight of the Hyperliquid USDH event is that the true value of a stablecoin issuer lies in the interoperability and deep integration of the economic distribution chain rather than the obtainable sovereign bond yield.He stated that candidate parties, including Frax and Paxos, are willing to return 100% of the yield to Hyperliquid, but the actual value should far exceed yield sharing.

item.title: A whale went long on PUMP with 5x leverage, with a total position of approximately $6.3 million.
item.description: On September 8th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale has established 3 wallets within the past 8 hours and gone long on PUMP with a leverage of 5 times. The total position is 1.31 billion PUMP tokens, which is equivalent to approximately $6.3 million.

item.title: SOMI, MYX, WLFI 24-Hour Liquidation Volume Surpasses Bitcoin
item.description: On September 8th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the liquidation volume of SOMI, MYX, and WLFI all exceeded that of Bitcoin. Among them:- SOMI surged by more than 56% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.64. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $17.4 million, mainly from short positions, and the current contract funding rate is negative.- MYX surged by more than 180% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.73. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $13.5 million, mainly from short positions, and the current contract funding rate is positive.- WLFI surged by more than 2% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.23. The liquidation volume in the past 24 hours was $12.2 million, experiencing both long and short liquidations, and the current contract funding rate is positive.

item.title: Korean trader NAMSEOKHEE has opened 56 types of altcoin long positions, re-betting on the upcoming alt season
item.description: September 8th. According to crypto KOL AB Kuai.Dong, the Korean trader NAMSEOKHEE, who previously went long on 107 meme coins simultaneously on Binance Futures and exited after a meme season bet went awry, has made a comeback. NAMSEOKHEE has initiated 56 meme long contract positions from last weekend to this morning, once again betting on the arrival of the meme season. This operation has transformed his overall position from a loss to a gain. In comparison to before, this time his strategy is more cautious:- For most meme coins, the margin is only $300 to $600;- Still employing cross 20x leverage;- Only for a few meme coins in which he is particularly bullish, he has raised the margin to $2500 and will hold the position without taking profits.

item.title: Listed Company on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, Emperor Holdings Ltd., Soars Over 34% During Trading Hours
item.description: On September 8th, based on market information, the Hong Kong-listed company Supreme Toa Holding (01413.HK) witnessed a significant surge of more than 34% during the trading day, with its market value rising to HK$1.24 billion.Previously, Supreme Toa Holding announced that it would utilize a portion of its own capital, not exceeding HK$4.5 million, for cryptocurrency investment through its indirectly held non-wholly-owned subsidiary, Galaxy Digital Limited.

item.title: Emperor Capital Group intends to spend up to HKD 4.5 million on cryptocurrency investment.
item.description: On September 8th, the Hong Kong-listed company Founders Group (01413.HK) announced that the company's board of directors has given the green light to a strategic investment framework. Under this framework, up to HKD 4.5 million of its own capital will be allocated for cryptocurrency investments through its indirect non-wholly owned subsidiary Dynex Digital Limited.

item.title: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia) and HSBC Express Intent to Apply for Stablecoin License to the Hong Kong Monetary Authority
item.description: On September 8th, according to The Standard, a subsidiary of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC), Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia), has signaled its intention to seek a stablecoin license from the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. It has become another major Chinese bank to take such an action following Bank of China Hong Kong. HSBC has also indicated its intention to apply for a stablecoin license to the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. However, it is currently undetermined whether HSBC will officially submit the application by the end of this month.The Financial Services and the Treasury Bureau has repeatedly emphasized that only a limited number of stablecoin licenses will be issued in the first phase. As of the end of last month, 77 institutions have expressed their intention to apply for a license to the Bureau.

item.title: ETH Scalping Strategy Nets $9.56M in Smart Money Accumulation HYPE, Buying 63,197 Coins at an Average Price of $47.41
item.description: September 8th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Gu (Twitter: @ai_9684xtpa), a shrewd investor who amassed $9.56 million through ETH scalping from June to August 2025 is currently accumulating HYPE. In the past 9 hours, this address has deposited 4.01 million USDC into Hyperliquid. With 2.996 million USDC, it purchased 63,197 HYPE at an average price of $47.41. The remaining $1.02 million funds placed a limit buy order at $47.17.

item.title: Analysis: The bearish sentiment of traders is gradually weakening, and the market is expected to see a rebound.
item.description: On September 8th, on-chain data analyst Murphy released a market analysis. The Volume Delta Balance (VDB) of perpetual contracts measures the recent futures market. It assesses the short-term trend of the buy/sell power delta (30-day moving average) relative to a longer-term market baseline (90-day median) to determine whether the current market is biased to the long side or short side and to observe whether this power is strengthening.Since early August, on Binance and other trading platforms, the VDB has dropped into negative territory. This indicates that perpetual contract traders, who are a speculative group in this market, have increasingly shown a bearish inclination in the subsequent period. However, this indicator has extremely high volatility. Therefore, a comparison between "short-term" and "mid-term" is used to observe the direction and magnitude of the deviation to confirm whether this negative bias will develop into a sustained trend (as indicated by the red arrow in th
